body.p: Paragraph B4.3.11 does not apply to embedded derivatives in contracts acquired in:

li.p: a business combination (as defined in IFRS 3 Business Combinations);
a combination of entities or businesses under common control as described in paragraphs B1–B4 of IFRS 3; or
the formation of a joint venture as defined in IFRS 11 Joint Arrangements

body.p: or their possible reassessment at the date of acquisition.
